ethnicGroups.name: Persians
ethnicGroups.description: The largest ethnic group, Persians form the cultural heartland of Iran.

ethnicGroups.name: Azeris
ethnicGroups.description: Concentrated in the northwest, with strong cultural ties to Azerbaijan and Turkey.

ethnicGroups.name: Kurds
ethnicGroups.description: Mountain communities known for vibrant culture and independence movements.

ethnicGroups.name: Lurs
ethnicGroups.description: Tribal people related to Persians with rich storytelling traditions.

ethnicGroups.name: Arabs
ethnicGroups.description: Coastal communities along the Persian Gulf with mixed cultural influences.

ethnicGroups.name: Baluchis
ethnicGroups.description: Connected culturally to Pakistan and Afghanistan, maintaining strong traditions.

ethnicGroups.name: Turkmen & Others
ethnicGroups.description: Including Turkmen, Gilaks, Mazandaranis, and other smaller groups.
